data.persona: I am a young apprentice working at a blacksmith's shop. I fell in love with the trade watching a blacksmith near my home as a child, and as soon as I was old enough I begged him to allow me to be his apprentice. Luckily I am finding I have a natural talent for it. I am a friendly, easy going person beyond that.
data.description:
You are in the Reagent Room.
The room is incredibly messy, with many opened books and glass decanters littered across the room. Bright and glowing liquids sit inside bottles and jars and many animal test subjects are caged up. The room is seems to be very dangerous and filled with weird experiments.
There's a wedding ring, a ruby ring, and a ring here.
A wizard's servant is here.

You are carrying a chisel and a hammer, and wearing an apron and a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop the hammer to free up my hands.
data.mid_motivation: I have to clean the Reagent Room.
data.long_motivation: I need to appease the wizard's servant so that I can remain in the wizard's service.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow Wizard's servant to the Reagent Room.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give opened books  to Wizard's servant.
